About the Business
There are two Kind of Pasta in Italy ,the dry pasta made by factory and the fresh pasta made by artisans ,mothers and grandmothers ,we are making all our fresh pasta every day from highest quality durum semolina,we handmade daily ravioli,agnolotti and gnocchi ,we use organic ingredients when available

Q:
Can a book a group event here?
A:
I don't know about group events, I do know they don't take reservations. If you have a larger group, they split you into multiple tables. The wait is ridiculous.
Christian

Q:
Do they accept cash?

also, do they offer coke products/fountain sodas?
A:
I'm sure they accept cash. It's not a fountain soda type of place but I'm sure they could tell you if they call them

A 4% service charge will be added to each guest check to ensure competitive industry compensation, as well as health and medical benefits, for all of our valued full time team members. In support of this initiative, the entirety of the charge is retained by the restaurant. If you would like this charge removed, please let our staff know. Thank you for dining with us and supporting our staff.
